name: Space to Grow (itch)
description:
Space to Grow is the most realistic tree simulation game in the world.

Created for the Kenney Jam 2022 with the theme 'Growth'.

Tap the space bar rapidly to grow as much as you can before the timer runs out, but don't pause for too long or gravity will fight against you!

Font is 'black pine trees' by Geronimo Font Studios.

Audio recorded by squashy555 on freesound.

All other assets by Kenney.
